titleStmt.title: The spirituall favorite at the throne of grace. By the late learned, and reverend divine Richard Sibbs Doctor in Divinity. Published by the authors owne appointment, subscribed with his hand; to prevent unperfect copies
titleStmt.author: Sibbes, Richard, 1577-1635.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Paine, for Ralph Mabb,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Cmabridge University Library.
